name: Baked Potato French Fries
description: These baked potato french fries are a healthier version of your favorite side.  Vegan and glutenfree

recipeInstructions.text: Scrub the potato and cut into not more than and 1/4 inch thick wedges/fries.
recipeInstructions.name: Scrub the potato and cut into not more than and 1/4 inch thick wedges/fries.

recipeInstructions.text: Add to a big bowl, add oil and spices and toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add to a big bowl, add oil and spices and toss well.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread out the wedges on a parchment lined baking sheet in single layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread out the wedges on a parchment lined baking sheet in single layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 420 degrees F for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 420 degrees F for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the tray and bake for another 5-10 minutes until golden or crisp to your preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn the tray and bake for another 5-10 minutes until golden or crisp to your preference.

keywords: baked potatoes, healthy alternative, potato side dish
